articles.author: Robert Lea
articles.title: This epic NASA map shows where to see US solar eclipses in 2023 and 2024 (photos) - Yahoo News
articles.description: If you missed 2017's "Great American Eclipse" because you didn't know where to see it, NASA is ensuring this won't happen again.
articles.content:
Skywatchers in the United States looking to observe solar eclipses over the next two years will be delighted with a super-detailed new map released by NASA. 
Based on data collected by several NASA … [+7960 chars]
